content.description:
Meeting a Famous Author

Numquamne legisti quendam virum, LiviLivius, -i, m.: Livy (a Roman historian) nomine gloriaque 
commotum ad videndum eum, ab ultimo terrarum orbe 
venisse, statimque ut viderat abisse?
content.question: In line 3, what does abisse mean?

unit.text: 3: Pliny's Letters: Ghosts and Apparitions, Letters to Trajan and Calpurnia, and Teacher's Choice - Latin Prose

skill.text: 1.A: Identify the meaning of Latin words and phrases.
